changeSet.sql: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW currency_price_daily WITH (timescaledb.continuous) AS SELECT symbol, time_bucket('1 day'::interval, timestamp) AS bucket_daily, first (price, timestamp) AS oldest_price, last (price, timestamp) AS newest_price, min (price) AS min_price, max (price) AS max_price, (max (price) - min (price)) / min (price) AS normalized_range FROM currency_prices GROUP BY symbol, bucket_daily

changeSet.sql: CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW currency_price_monthly WITH (timescaledb.continuous) AS SELECT symbol, time_bucket('1 month'::interval, bucket_daily) AS bucket_monthly, first (oldest_price, bucket_daily) AS oldest_price, last (newest_price, bucket_daily) AS newest_price, min (min_price) AS min_price, max (max_price) AS max_price, (max (max_price) - min (min_price)) / min (min_price) AS normalized_range FROM currency_price_daily GROUP BY symbol, bucket_monthly
